data.eml:eml: Re-description of Cephalobus topali Andrássy, 1970 (Rhabditida, Cephalobidae) from Vietnam, and transfer to Acrobeloides (Cobb, 1924) Thorne, 1937

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Nguyen, Thi Anh Duong, Bonkowski, Michael, Peña-Santiago, Reyes, Abolafia, Joaquín (2016): Re-description of Cephalobus topali Andrássy, 1970 (Rhabditida, Cephalobidae) from Vietnam, and transfer to Acrobeloides (Cobb, 1924) Thorne, 1937. Zootaxa 4092 (4): 593-600, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4092.4.9
